meta.job_title: Sr Manager, IT and Professional Services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute category practices for the Information Technology Software, including sourcing strategy definition, deployment, and stakeholder management.
Define and achieve clear targets in conjunction with Procurement counterparts and business stakeholders.
Lead global Information Technology and Professional Services category strategy implementation and savings realization.
Initiate internal and external analysis, consolidating requirements, and leading contract implementation.
Manage commercial supplier relationship management with key suppliers and lead supplier development activities.
Collaborate with legal to finalize contractual agreement and its administration.
Maintain and manage relationships with suppliers, and manage relationship with key stakeholders and business representatives.
Manage relationship with regional and local business units, promoting/escalating region-specific procurement requirements on a global level.
Deliver annual cost reduction/savings and avoidance according to the defined targets and company-wide Diversity goals and supplier value capture objectives.
Achieve 'buy-in' from key stakeholders for major procurement initiatives, and act as a point of contact for the business to assure business requirements are met.
Support resource allocation between global and regional/local category initiatives.
Support input on volume/specification/price to build smart consumption policies.
Manage relationship with regional and local business units, promoting/escalating region-specific procurement requirements on a global level.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Economics, Finance, Procurement Legal or comparable profession required. MBA or other advanced degree in Business, Economics, Finance, Procurement Legal or comparable profession preferred.
